news.content: Congratulations to Prof. Fan on becoming the Acting Head of the Base of Red Bird MPhil (RBM), College of Future Technology (CFT)!
Two papers accepted at IJHCS. Congrats to Chutian, Xiaozhu, and their co-authors!
Two papers accepted at IMWUT 2025. Congrats to Fan, Peixuan, and their co-authors!
One paper accepted at ASSETS 2025. Congrats to Shumeng, and co-authors!
Prof. Fan was invited to give a talk at the ROP project kickoff meeting and received the Best Presentation Award.
One art paper accepted at Siggraph Asia 2025 Art track. Congrats to Shumeng!
One paper accepted at IMWUT 2025. Congrats to Ruohao, and co-authors!
